simplified: 常在河边走，哪有不湿鞋

pronunciation.pinyin: cháng zài hé biān zǒu , nǎ yǒu bù shī xié
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: chang2 zai4 he2 bian1 zou3 , na3 you3 bu4 shi1 xie2

details.simplified: 常在河边走，哪有不湿鞋
details.traditional: 常在河邊走，哪有不濕鞋

meanings.value: a person who regularly walks by the river cannot avoid getting their shoes wet (proverb)
it comes with the territory (e.g. a person with the power to grant favors will inevitably succumb to temptation and take a bribe)
